projects.title: Notes Application
projects.description: Single Page Full Stack Web Application that allows authenticated users to Create, Read, Update & Delete Notes.

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.description: Single Page Web Application that fetches and displays weather information from an external API (AccuWeather) that matches the location the user searched for.

projects.title: ESW IT Business Advisors Reporting Portal
projects.description: My classmates & I worked with ESW IT Business Advisors to redesign & rebuild their existing Reporting Portal for our capstone project.

projects.title: Movie/TV Info Application
projects.description: Multi Page Web Application similar to IMDB that fetches and displays Movie/TV Show information from an external API (TMDB) that matches the user's search criteria or the genre they selected.

projects.title: Recipe Application
projects.description: Multi Page Web Application similar to Allrecipes that fetches and displays a list of recipes from an external API (TheMealDB) that matches the user's search criteria or they category they selected.

projects.title: Web Portfolio
projects.description: Version 4.0 of my web portfolio showcasing who I am, my projects, work/project experience and my social links/contact information
